name: Poppers - Final Year Project
description:
This is a shooter game like call of duty zombies where the aim of the game is to defeat all enemies every round, and survive as many rounds as you can. The higher rounds you can get to, the more your personal rank increases and you can even earn yourself a place on the global leaderboard! A description of the game can be found in the main menu of the game along with the controls.

This game is for my final year project at university so once you don't want to play anymore, please fill out this google form questionnaire https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf9KjHB869aN3ztU-eLoQC1k5HVa6u-hcQu4UEj... or click the 'Give Feedback' button in the main menu. The survey should take no longer than 15 minutes and any honest and constructive feedback would be greatly appreciated <3

Poppers is 45 MB, available for Mac and Windows, and requires internet to play even though it is an offline game.
